47
RDF and RDF Schema
Exercise
•Objective
• Get used to the different syntaxes of RDF(S)
•Tasks
• Take the text of an RDF(S) file and create its corresponding graph
• Take an RDF(S) graph and create its corresponding RDF/XML and N3 files
